title: Video of Martyred Army Officer’s Son? No, It’s a Pak Child Artist
subtitle: Fact Check: Viral Singing Video of a child artist singing a song is doing rounds on social media with a claim that the aforementioned child is an army officer’s son whose father was martyred in an operation against the militants.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video of a child singing is doing the rounds on social media, with the claim that the said child is a martyred Army officer’s son who is studying at a boarding Army Public School.

The video has been shared widely on Facebook and Twitter with similar claims.
